original_text: Is it not enough for you to feed on the good pasture, that you must tread down with your feet the rest of your pasture; and to drink of clear water, that you must muddy the rest of the water with your feet?
korean_text: 너희가 좋은 꼴을 먹는 것을 작은 일로 여기느냐 어찌하여 남은 꼴을 발로 밟았느냐 너희가 맑은 물을 마시는 것을 작은 일로 여기느냐 어찌하여 남은 물을 발로 더럽혔느냐

sentences.original_text: Is it not enough for you to feed on the good pasture,
sentences.korean_translation: 좋은 목초지에서 먹는 것이 너희에게 충분하지 않으냐,

sentences.original_text: that you must tread down with your feet the rest of your pasture;
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 발로 남은 목초지를 짓밟아야 하느냐;

sentences.original_text: and to drink of clear water,
that you must muddy the rest of the water with your feet?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 발로 남은 물을 흐려놓아야 하느냐?
